content: witch s hat elv needleworks witch s hat what you will need ● size g 4mm crochet hook ● 250 yards of worsted weight yarn ● stitch markers terms you should know magic_ring chain - chain stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet flo - front loop only m - place marker scinc - single_crochet increase all terms are us terms page 2 elv needleworks ©2023 witch s hat pattern this hat is worked in continuous rounds i recommend placing a marker at the beginning of your row to help keep track of your stitches row 1 work 4 single_crochet into a magic_ring 4 stitches row 2 single_crochet scinc repeat 6 stitches row 3 single_crochet single_crochet scinc pm single_crochet single_crochet scinc pm 8 stitches row single_crochet in each stitch until one stitch before marker scinc repeat 4-52 continue like this until you reach row 52 106 stitches row single_crochet around 106 stitches 53-59 row 60 *16sc scinc repeat from * around six times 4sc slip_stitch 112 stitches row 61 in flo *13sc scinc repeat from * around 120 stitches row 62 *7sc scinc 7sc repeat from * around 128 stitches row 63 *15sc scinc repeat from * around 136 stitches row 64 *8sc scinc 8sc repeat from * around 144 stitches row 65 *17sc scinc repeat from * around 152 stitches row 66 *9sc scinc 9sc repeat from * around 160 stitches row 67 single_crochet around 160 stitches row 68 single_crochet around until second to last stitch slip_stitch tie off page 3 elv needleworks ©2023 witch s hat thank you for downloading witch s hat if you have any questions or need some help don t hesitate to email elvneedleworks@gmail com or join our discord server at https //discordapp com/invite/wxngnhd page 4 elv needleworks ©2023
